titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Walocel MW 3000 PFV.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/11/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Methyl Hydroxyethyl Cellulose with a 30% or greater content of 2-hydroxyethyl methyl ether cellulose reaction products with glyoxal (Walocel MW 3000 PFV).
